name: Cheep City - Heritage Game Jam 2020
description:
Building a collective narrative is a collaborative effort, filled with tolerance and love!

Build stuff, and click on stuff to read/write its narrative!

This is an online multiplayer city-builder, made out of curiosity on the kind of collective narrative we would attach to our home and the message we would want to leave behind to the next player.

  • ARROW KEYS to move
  • MOUSE WHEEL to navigate the map and inventory 
  • LEFT CLICK to build and read/write an item's narrative 
  • RIGHT CLICK to destroy an item
  • TAB to hide UI
  • C and ENTER to chat

Made in Unity

Have fun!
